price: Sọ pé: “Gbogbo ọpẹ́ ń jẹ́ ti Allāhu. Kí àlàáfíà máa bá àwọn ẹrúsìn Rẹ̀, àwọn tí Ó ṣà lẹ́ṣà. Ṣé Allāhu l’Ó lóore jùlọ ni tàbí n̄ǹkan tí wọ́n ń sọ di akẹgbẹ́ Rẹ̀?”
arabic: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: quli al-ḥamdu lillahi wasalāmun ʿalā ʿibādihi alladhīna iṣ'ṭafā āllahu khayrun ammā yush'rikūna
